title: Why do singers release singles from an album after the album is already released? - Quora

response.answer_text: the people who buy singles and the people who buy album may not be the same. Radios often only play singles. When I was younger I mostly got the music I liked from radio and those were only the singles so that I would notice a new track released when it came on the radio because I never bought albums. At that time I also bought 12″ singles occasionally. Later I started buying albums (CDs actually) and only bought some singles when they were special remixes on CD. Today, buying a complete albums is not necessary and singles are not as important, but the radio airplay thing is still happening.
Usually the single is the most popular or most played song and there was one more song that didn't make it on the album, so they release that one with it.
